Navigation
Name Rascal/Libraries/Prelude/Message
Types 
data Message
     = error(str msg, loc at)
     | warning(str msg, loc at)
     | info(str msg, loc at)
     ;
Usage import Message;
Description Messages can be used to communicate information about source texts. They can be interpreted by IDE's to display type errors and warnings, etc.
[Edit] | [New Subconcept] | [Recompile Course] | [Warnings]
